verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:5
verses.text: Who then is Paul, and who is Apollos, but ministers by whom ye believed, even as the Lord gave to every man?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:6
verses.text: I have planted, Apollos watered; but God gave the increase.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:7
verses.text: So then neither is he that planteth any thing, neither he that watereth; but God that giveth the increase.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:8
verses.text: Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one: and every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 3:9
verses.text: For we are labourers together with God: ye are God’s husbandry, ye are God’s building.
